entry.sentence: He saw to his relief that not all people doubted him .

entry.deps: nsubj(saw-2, He-1) root(ROOT-0, saw-2) poss(relief-5, his-4) prep_to(saw-2, relief-5) mark(doubted-10, that-6) neg(people-9, not-7) det(people-9, all-8) nsubj(doubted-10, people-9) ccomp(saw-2, doubted-10) dobj(doubted-10, him-11)

entry.sentence: The words of the kind woman reached his heart as if they were the good words of a mother .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (NNS words)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT the) (NN kind) (NN woman)))) (VP (VBD reached) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN heart)) (SBAR (RB as) (IN if) (S (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VBD were) (NP (NP (DT the) (JJ good) (NNS words)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT a) (NN mother)))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(words-2, The-1) nsubj(reached-7, words-2) det(woman-6, the-4) nn(woman-6, kind-5) prep_of(words-2, woman-6) root(ROOT-0, reached-7) poss(heart-9, his-8) dobj(reached-7, heart-9) advmod(words-16, as-10) mark(words-16, if-11) nsubj(words-16, they-12) cop(words-16, were-13) det(words-16, the-14) amod(words-16, good-15) advcl(reached-7, words-16) det(mother-19, a-18) prep_of(words-16, mother-19)

entry.sentence: He could have kissed her hands gratefully , and it urged him to answer the letter immediately .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (S (NP (PRP He)) (VP (MD could) (VP (VB have) (VP (VBN kissed) (NP (PRP$ her) (NNS hands)) (ADVP (RB gratefully)))))) (, ,) (CC and) (S (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBD urged) (S (NP (PRP him)) (VP (TO to) (VP (VB answer) (NP (DT the) (NN letter)) (ADVP (RB immediately))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(kissed-4, He-1) aux(kissed-4, could-2) aux(kissed-4, have-3) root(ROOT-0, kissed-4) poss(hands-6, her-5) dobj(kissed-4, hands-6) advmod(kissed-4, gratefully-7) nsubj(urged-11, it-10) conj_and(kissed-4, urged-11) nsubj(answer-14, him-12) aux(answer-14, to-13) xcomp(urged-11, answer-14) det(letter-16, the-15) dobj(answer-14, letter-16) advmod(answer-14, immediately-17)

entry.sentence: It occurred to him that perhaps the matron could recommend and procure a governess for his daughter .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP It)) (VP (VBD occurred) (PP (TO to) (NP (PRP him))) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (RB perhaps) (DT the) (NN matron)) (VP (MD could) (VP (VB recommend) (CC and) (VB procure) (NP (NP (DT a) (NNS governess)) (PP (IN for) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN daughter))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(occurred-2, It-1) root(ROOT-0, occurred-2) prep_to(occurred-2, him-4) mark(recommend-10, that-5) advmod(matron-8, perhaps-6) det(matron-8, the-7) nsubj(recommend-10, matron-8) nsubj(procure-12, matron-8) aux(recommend-10, could-9) ccomp(occurred-2, recommend-10) ccomp(occurred-2, procure-12) conj_and(recommend-10, procure-12) det(governess-14, a-13) dobj(recommend-10, governess-14) poss(daughter-17, his-16) prep_for(governess-14, daughter-17)

entry.sentence: Through her convent ladies she was certainly in contact with many families , and she could perhaps recommend a suitable young lady to him .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (S (PP (IN Through) (NP (PRP$ her) (NN convent) (NNS ladies))) (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD was) (ADVP (RB certainly)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NN contact))) (PP (IN with) (NP (JJ many) (NNS families))))) (, ,) (CC and) (S (NP (PRP she)) (VP (MD could) (ADVP (RB perhaps)) (VP (VB recommend) (NP (DT a) (JJ suitable) (JJ young) (NN lady)) (PP (TO to) (NP (PRP him)))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: poss(ladies-4, her-2) nn(ladies-4, convent-3) prep_through(was-6, ladies-4) nsubj(was-6, she-5) root(ROOT-0, was-6) advmod(was-6, certainly-7) prep_in(was-6, contact-9) amod(families-12, many-11) prep_with(was-6, families-12) nsubj(recommend-18, she-15) aux(recommend-18, could-16) advmod(recommend-18, perhaps-17) conj_and(was-6, recommend-18) det(lady-22, a-19) amod(lady-22, suitable-20) amod(lady-22, young-21) dobj(recommend-18, lady-22) prep_to(recommend-18, him-24)

entry.sentence: So he answered the letter .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (IN So) (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD answered) (NP (DT the) (NN letter))) (. .)))
entry.deps: dep(answered-3, So-1) nsubj(answered-3, he-2) root(ROOT-0, answered-3) det(letter-5, the-4) dobj(answered-3, letter-5)
